To use `hsync`, do we need to use `SparkHadoopUtil.createNonECFile` for this driver logging? It's because `ErasureCoding` officially doesn't support `hsync` well.
- https://hadoop.apache.org/docs/r3.2.0/hadoop-project-dist/hadoop-hdfs/HDFSErasureCoding.html#Limitations

            case other =>
              other.hflush()
